#Text=Montreal/North Island
#Text=North Island is a district of Montreal composed of these neighbourhoods :
#Text=Ahuntsic-Cartierville
#Text=Saint-Laurent
#Text=Saint-Leonard
#Text=Montreal-Nord
#Text=Villeray — Saint-Michel — Parc-Extension
#Text=Understand
#Text=Ahuntsic-Cartierville sits on the banks of the Rivière des Prairies .
#Text=It traces its history to the fortified Sault-au-Récollet settlement , which was established by the Sulpicians in 1696 .
#Text=This in turn led to the colonization of the area .
#Text=Saint-Laurent is the second-largest employment hub within the metropolitan region , after downtown Montréal .
#Text=It is home to the headquarters of Air Canada and Air Transat .
#Text=Bombardier Aerospace has its Amphibious Aircraft Division in Saint-Laurent .
#Text=Saint-Leonard has one of the highest concentrations of Italian-Canadians in the city .

#Text=It has surpassed Montreal 's rapidly gentrifying Little Italy as the centre for Italian culture in the city , with numerous cultural institutions and commercial enterprises serving the city 's second-most populous cultural community .

#Text=The borough is characterized by its spacious , wide-set semi-detached brick duplexes ( and triplexes , four-plexes , and five-plexes — an architectural style unique to Montreal ) , backyard vegetable gardens , Italian bars ( cafés ) , and pastry shops serving Italian-Canadian staples such as cannoli , sfogliatelle , lobster tails , and zeppole .
#Text=At some times of year , it is possible to observe seasonal Italian traditions like the making of wine , cheese , sausage , and tomato sauce in quantity .
#Text=Parc Extension or ' Parc-Ex ' as it is known by the locals , is in the middle of Montrea .
#Text=It is home to over 100 different ethnicities yet is mostly known for its Greek community which helped make the district what it is today .
#Text=Montreal 's Greektown has historically been located in the district of Parc Extension .
#Text=Jean-Talon Boulevard , which runs through Parc Extension , is home to many Greek restaurants and shops .
#Text=The same can be said for Parc Avenue .

#Text=Saint-Michel is the home of Le Boulevard shopping centre and also is home to the headquarters of the world-renowned Cirque Du Soleil ( Tohu la Cité des Arts du Cirque ) , and the Complexe environmental Saint-Michel .

#Text=Saint-Michel is ethnically diverse : Italians , Haitians , Arabs , Asians , Hispanics as well as people of French descent ( Québécois ) represent the major ethnic groups of this inner city area .
#Text=Get in
#Text=The orange and blue lines of the Montreal Metro
#Text=Commuter rail of the Réseau de transport métropolitain
#Text=Autoroute 15 ( Laurentian Autoroute/Autoroute des Laurentides ) runs north-south
#Text=Autoroute 40
#Text=( Metropolitan Autoroute/Autoroute Métropolitaine ) runs east-west
#Text=Autoroute 520
#Text=Autoroute 13
#Text=See
#Text=Parc-nature de l'Île-de-la-Visitation , 2425 boul Gouin Est , ☏ +1514 280-6733 .
#Text=Sault-au-Récollet .
#Text=One of the oldest villages on the island of Montreal , it retains its village atmosphere with many houses dating from the 18th and 19th centuries .
#Text=It was the original site of Fort Lorette , a trading post and mission for the conversion of the First Nations people of the area .
#Text=Cité des arts du cirque , TOHU ( Circus Arts City TOHU ) , 2345 rue Jarry Est , ☏ +1 514-376-8648 , toll-free : +1-888-376-8648 .
#Text=Pavilion 09:00 - 17:00 , box office 12:00 - 17:00 , shop 12:00 - 17:00 and 1 hour after the show .
#Text=A centre for performance , creativity , experimentation , and convergence of culture , the environment and community involvement .
#Text=Pierre Granche 's sculpture , Parc de Montréal-Nord ( at the intersection of boulevards Henri-Bourassa and Léger ) .
#Text=Do
#Text=Orioles de Montréal baseball team , Gary Carter Stadium ( formerly Marcel-Clement Field ) in Ahuntsic Park .
#Text=Ligue de Baseball Élite du Québec team .
#Text=Buy

#Text=Outdoor complex with outlet stores .

#Text=155 stores .
#Text=Anchors are Canadian Tire , Marché Adonis , Sports Experts/Atmosphere , Dollarama and Uniprix .

#Text=M - F 09:30 - 21:00 , Sa 09:00 - 17:00 , Su 10:00-17:00. 70 stores including Canadian Tire .

#Text=Kosher fast-food restaurant with Mediterranean grilled meats .

#Text=Restaurant Le St-Urbain , 96 Rue Fleury Ouest , ☏ +1 514-504-7700 .
#Text=Modern cuisine made from products of the market , often organic , and from the Quebec terroir .
#Text=The menu varies with the seasons .
#Text=Tasting menu and the food-wine pairings .
#Text=Many of the dishes use vacuum cooking techniques and their in-house smokehouse .
#Text=Mains $ 29 - 46 , .

#Text=M - Sa 08:00-02:30 , Su 10:00-02:30. A dive bar enjoyed for its cheap beer and pool tables .
